laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated fasting plasma glucose levels consistent with diabetes.
Elevated HbA1c levels consistent with diabetes.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: CBC (Hemoglobin, White Blood Cell Count, Platelets)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Hemoglobin, white blood cell count, and platelets were all within normal ranges.
Liver function tests were all within normal ranges.

laboratory_examinations.date: Before radiotherapy and stable for 10 months post-radiotherapy
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: PSA levels were stable for 10 months post-radiotherapy until the onset of rectal bleeding.

laboratory_examinations.date: One month after initiating M-B enema therapy
laboratory_examinations.findings: No ulceration observed; density of telangiectasia remained unchanged; reduced extent of rectal mucosal congestion and hypervascularity; improvement in inflammatory cell infiltration.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Histopathological analysis revealed improvement compared to previous findings.
